synopsis.text:
Kuniko finds herself wandering aimlessly through the bustling streets of a futuristic Tokyo on her well-deserved day off. The city, once plagued by traffic congestion and overpopulation, has been reimagined under the innovative concept of city sharing, where urban spaces transform with the passing hours. As she yearns for an exhilarating adventure, a garishly decorated truck roars past her, its booming music and eye-catching design instantly recognizable as the infamous ramen truck that has captured the internet's attention.

Seizing the opportunity, Kuniko pursues the elusive vehicle and crosses paths with Ganaha and Kasuya, fellow thrill-seekers in their sleek Mercedes-Benz A-Class. United by their shared determination to taste the legendary ramen, they embark on a high-speed chase through the ever-shifting cityscape, weaving through the transforming roads in hot pursuit of their mouthwatering quarry. Will they manage to catch up to the elusive truck and savor its delectable offerings, or will their daring quest leave them hungry for more? Join Kuniko, Ganaha, and Kasuya on their thrilling adventure to find out!
